account_id.description: The unique identifier for the Facebook ad account.

account_status.description: The status of the Facebook ad account.

age.description: Age associated with the ad account.

amount_spent.description: Total amount spent on ads by the ad account.

balance.description: Current balance of the ad account.

business.description: Represents information about the business associated with the ad account.

id.description: The unique identifier for the associated business.

business_country_code.description: Country code associated with the business.

business_street2.description: Additional street information of the business.

business_zip.description: ZIP code associated with the business.

can_create_brand_lift_study.description: Flag indicating if the ad account can create brand lift studies.

capabilities.description: Specifies the capabilities of the ad account.

items.description: List of capabilities associated with the ad account.

created_time.description: Date and time when the ad account was created.

currency.description: Currency used by the ad account.

disable_reason.description: Reason for disabling the ad account.

end_advertiser.description: The end advertiser associated with the ad account.

extended_credit_invoice_group.description: Contains details about the extended credit invoice group linked to the ad account.

id.description: Unique identifier for the extended credit invoice group.

auto_enroll.description: Flag indicating if auto-enroll is enabled.

email.description: Email address associated with the extended credit invoice group.

emails.description: Emails associated with the extended credit invoice group.

items.description: List of email addresses associated with the extended credit invoice group.

name.description: Name of the extended credit invoice group.

failed_delivery_checks.description: List of failed delivery checks performed for the ad account.

summary.description: Summary of the failed delivery check.

description.description: Description of the failed delivery check.

check_name.description: Name of the failed delivery check.

fb_entity.description: Facebook entity associated with the ad account.

funding_source.description: Source of funding for the ad account.

funding_source_details.description: Provides information about the funding source linked to the ad account.

display_string.description: Display string for the funding source details.

id.description: Unique identifier for the funding source.

has_migrated_permissions.description: Flag indicating if permissions have been migrated.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ad account.

io_number.description: IO number associated with the ad account.

is_attribution_spec_system_default.description: Flag indicating if attribution specification is system default.

is_direct_deals_enabled.description: Flag indicating if direct deals are enabled.

is_in_3ds_authorization_enabled_market.description: Flag indicating if the ad account is in a 3DS authorization enabled market.

is_notifications_enabled.description: Flag indicating if notifications are enabled for the ad account.

is_personal.description: Flag indicating if the ad account is personal.

is_prepay_account.description: Flag indicating if the ad account is a prepay account.

is_tax_id_required.description: Flag indicating if a tax ID is required for the ad account.

line_numbers.description: Line numbers associated with the ad account.

media_agency.description: Media agency associated with the ad account.

min_campaign_group_spend_cap.description: Minimum campaign group spend cap for the ad account.

min_daily_budget.description: Minimum daily budget for the ad account.

offsite_pixels_tos_accepted.description: Flag indicating if offsite pixels terms of service are accepted.

partner.description: Partner associated with the ad account.

rf_spec.description: Specifications related to reach and frequency for the ad account.

countries.description: List of countries targeted by the ad account for reach and frequency campaigns.

items.description: List of countries specified in the RF spec.

global_io_max_campaign_duration.description: Global max duration of the IO campaign.

max_days_to_finish.description: Max days to finish the campaign.

min_reach_limits.description: Min reach limits specified in the RF spec.

spend_cap.description: Spend cap for the ad account.

tax_id.description: Tax ID associated with the ad account.

tax_id_status.description: Status of the tax ID associated with the ad account.

tax_id_type.description: Type of tax ID associated with the ad account.

timezone_id.description: Timezone ID associated with the ad account.

timezone_name.description: Name of the timezone associated with the ad account.

timezone_offset_hours_utc.description: Timezone offset hours in UTC for the ad account.

tos_accepted.description: Indicates whether the terms of service have been accepted for the ad account.

web_custom_audience_tos.description: TOS accepted for web custom audience.

user_tasks.description: Tasks assigned to users associated with the ad account.

items.description: List of user tasks associated with the ad account.

user_tos_accepted.description: Records the acceptance of terms of service by users of the ad account.

web_custom_audience_tos.description: TOS accepted for web custom audience by the user.
